#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long int
ll a[111111],n;
int search(ll d,ll c){
	ll cnt=1;
	ll i;
	ll prev=a[0];
	for(i=1;i<n;i++){
		if(a[i]-prev>=d){
			prev=a[i];
			++cnt;
		}
	}
	return cnt==c;
}
int main(){
	ll num;
	cin>>n>>num;
	int i,j;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
	sort(a,a+n);
	ll l=0;
	ll r=a[n-1]-a[0];
	ll ans=-1;
	
	while(r-l>1){
		int m=(l+r)>>1;
		if(search(m,num)){
			ans=m;
			l=m;
			
		}
		else
			r=m;
	}
	cout<<ans<<endl;
}
